      • getPureXStream

        @NotNull
public com.thoughtworks.xstream.XStream getPureXStream()

      • getBasicXStream

        @NotNull
public com.thoughtworks.xstream.XStream getBasicXStream()

      • loadPluginXStream

        @JvmStatic
 @NotNull
public com.thoughtworks.xstream.XStream loadPluginXStream()

        Searches for implementations of interface XStreamProvider using ServiceLoader and loads their classes into a new basic XStream instance.

        Returns:
        a XStream instance able to handle custom registered classes.
        See Also:
        interface XStreamProvider, ServiceLoader
